data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 30136, Version Hash: 0cd0025be1fe86101718f88e7575701dd8d03466
data.actual_result: You have 2 accounts that are in a call. One is inactive(logged out of) and one active(you're on it right now).
data.expected_result: Your first account you logged out of should automatically leave the call.
data.short_description: When you log out, and log back in with a different account, your first account still stays in the call.
data.steps_to_repro: - Log out of your account - Log in with a different account - Join the same call as your first account
